page.title: 04My Family.
page.content: My name is{Clare Thomas}and I am 11 years of age.I am in a family of 4 and I have one{sister}named Louise who is 13 years of age and attends a comprehensive school in Port Talbot, 4 miles away from our home. We have 2 {cars,}an Austin Montego M.G. and a Vauxhall Chevette, both of which are blue.Both my parents work.My{father}is manager of an engineering company and my{mother}is the: typist, accountant, telephonist and receptionist. We have three{pets}and are taking care of 4 kittens at the moment.My family are quite an active lot and we do much walking.Our longest walk started in Hirwaun at 9:00a.m. and finished in Margam Park at 8:00p.m., covering about 23\ miles. Sometimes we go down rivers on our rubber-dinghy,but we haven't done so
